channel.title: New Kernel Systemd Serivces Troubleshooting
channel.description:
Hi,
Installed the Whonix hardened kernel on another distro and now some systemd services will not start. Don't seem to be able to restart these services and when sudo systemctl start [service] is run, there is an error message which is described as exit-code. Also commands to the dbus seem to fail as well, returning Failed to connect to bus: Connection Refused

item.title: New Kernel Systemd Serivces Troubleshooting
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
2 posts were merged into an existing topic: kernel recompilation for better hardening

Read full topic
